channel.title: mocha on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in mocha on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Testing a TypeScript API With Mocha and Chai
item.description: We are going to be using the very simple TypeScript API we developed in a previous tutorial in order to learn about Mocha and Chai Testing. In this tutorial, we’ll be looking at how you can get a very simple test framework up and running for your TypesScript based API using the mocha and chai testing libraries. Why Do We Test? Being able to accurately test any application you build is hugely important for any software developer regardless of the technology stack they are working with.
